H0.text: Aleph, Beth, Gimel, Daleth are A B C D in which language. Arabic

H1.text: Aleph, Beth, Gimel, Daleth are A B C D in which language. Aramaic

H2.text: Aleph, Beth, Gimel, Daleth are A B C D in which language. Phoenician

H3.text: Aleph, Beth, Gimel, Daleth are A B C D in which language. עברית

A4.text: The Hebrew alphabet (Hebrew: אָלֶף־בֵּית עִבְרִי) is a unicameral abjad script used in the writing of the Hebrew language.
